nodes.text: Star Wars - Die Rache der Sith is an original German-language audio drama adaptation of Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith. It contains dramatized passages from the film script performed by a cast in German translation along with narration by Joachim Kerzel. The CD was released by the German label WortArt in 2005 as part of a series of six single-disc audio adaptations of the original and prequel trilogies.
